text:
Princess Zelda, you've
succeeded! Your
victory has brought

peace and light back to
Tolemac. Your courage
and strength will not

be forgotten. For now,
your work is done. Off
you go to celebrate

Link's return. But first
remember, lessons of
the heart, mercy, and

human kindness prevail
above all else. Farewell,
young Princess!
